creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: indigo, red; central embroidered band encircles sleeve: red with yellow, black and white ending in a triangle (pointed) motif; narrow band of embroidery (approx. 1" wide) at lower edge of sleeve opening; all bands applied after embroidered; embroidery includes key, diamond, cross motifs
title: Pair of Sleeves
